alert.note: Alert for Lee; Phillips (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:23PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lee, northeastern Phillips and southwestern Tunica Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 523 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over St Francis National Park, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Helena-West Helena, St Francis National Park, Tunica, Huma, Fox Island, Quarles, Austin, Clayton, Phillips Bayou, Whitehall, Evansville, Wycamp, Helena Crossing and Haleside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
